  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the one of the poly 230 gallon totes of nalco 1392 (un3265) had a loose cap and had released 10 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023060806
item.description:
Report E-2023060806

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-20T21:09:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: CONNERSVILLE
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: RECLAIMED ENERGY CO., INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: One drum of non regulated material was manifested to Reclaimed Energy. Upon receipt and lab analysis it was determined the material was hazardous (flash point was <140) and actually matched a hazardous waste stream set up for the customer UN1133 Waste Adhesives. Upon conversations with the customer. The waste drum was labeled incorrectly.

item.title: Report X-2023061267
item.description:
Report X-2023061267

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: GREENWOOD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE ARRIVED IN THE QA AREA THE PACKAGE WAS NOTICABLY WET UPON INSPECTION IT WAS NOTCIED THAT BOTH 1 GAL BOTTLES OF ZEP DEGREASER HAD FAILED DUE TO POOR CLOSURES AND INNER PACKAGING DescribePack: THE PACKAGE FAILED AT THE TOP DUE TO POOR CLOSURES AND ON ITS SIDE DUE TO NO INNER PACKAGING DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ONCE DEEMED A FULLY REGULATED PACKAGE IT WAS SEGREGATED FROM OTHERS

  • City: SOUTH BEND

  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the poly 330 gallon totes of ammonium bisulfite (un2693) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 2 quarts of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
